name: Andrzej Ito
profile_summary: As a Software Development Engineer with over 9 years of experience, I specialize in designing and building scalable software solutions. My expertise includes leading cross-functional teams and mentoring junior engineers to deliver high-quality projects. I prioritize user experience, performance, and innovation in every project. I am proficient in **Agile methodologies**, **RESTful APIs**, **Microservices architecture**, and have a strong understanding of cloud technologies like **AWS** and **Azure**. Currently, I focus on enhancing accessibility and driving technical excellence in all facets of my work.

experience.responsibilities:
• Lead the development of key services within **Java** cloud-based applications, focusing on **Microservices Architecture** and **REST API design**.
• Designed and developed Hybrid-single Page Application using **Java**, **Spring Boot**, **React 17**, and **Redux 4.2.1**.
• Enhanced the React Observables with **Redux**, **React-router**, and **Redux-thunk**.
• Developed user interface by using **React HOC**, **Flux/Redux** for SPA development.
• Worked on UI layer using **Angular 14**, **HTML5**, **CSS**, and **Bootstrap** to build rich, flexible, and user-interactive web pages.
• Hands-on experience with **Core Java** with **Multithreading**, **Concurrency**, **File Handling I/O**, **Generics**, **Data Structures** and **Collections**, **Garbage Collection**.
• Used **Node.js**, **MongoDB**, and **Node Package Manager** for installing dependencies and to run the application in a web server in the staging environment.
• Experienced with RDBMS implementation and development using **Oracle**, **MySQL**, **MS SQL**, and **PostgreSQL**.
• Automated **Docker** image deployment to a **dev/fqt** and production environment using **Jenkins** and **Ansible**.

• Developed and designed responsive user interfaces using **HTML5**, **CSS3**, **JavaScript**, **jQuery**, and **AngularJS** to enhance user experience and engagement.
• Implemented **Spring MVC** architecture, leveraging **JSP** and **JSTL** for robust web applications, ensuring efficient handling of client requests.
• Designed and executed RESTful APIs using **Spring Boot** and integrated with microservices for seamless data exchange.
• Engaged in back-end development using **Hibernate** for database operations, creating over **20+ DAO classes** for data retrieval and storage.
• Created modular and reusable components in **Angular 12 & 13**, enhancing application scalability and maintainability across different project areas.
• Enabled real-time functionalities by implementing **Web Sockets**, facilitating bidirectional communication and immediate updates.
• Developed interactive dashboards utilizing **ChartJS**, integrating complex data visualizations, and authentication mechanisms with **Auth Guards**.
• Ensured cross-browser compatibility and optimized performance by applying best practices in **HTML5**, **CSS3**, and **JavaScript**, as well as utilizing task runners like **Grunt**.

• Developed robust web applications utilizing **Spring MVC**, **jQuery**, **HTML**, **JavaScript**, **CSS**, **Web Forms**, and frameworks like **Material UI** and **Tailwind CSS** for superior user experience.
• Employed **jQuery** for implementing user interface controls ensuring client-side validation, enhancing application efficiency.
• Transformed designs from Photoshop and Figma into compliant, standards-based XHTML and CSS, achieving responsive web design.
• Implemented Cross-Origin Resource Sharing (CORS) utilizing **Node.js** and developed **RESTful services** using **Node** and **Express**, enabling seamless data communication.
• Designed and developed **SSIS packages** for data exportation from flat file sources to **MS SQL Server**, improving data migration processes.
• Enhanced web application performance and manageability through experience with tools such as **Bower**, **NPM**, and version control **Git**.
• Leveraged cloud services including **AWS**, **Azure**, **GCP**, and **Heroku** to deploy applications and optimize scalability, ensuring reliable service delivery.
